body_html:
After tweaking the minimal example, I also got the error after 17 and 18 iterations
I noticed the free memory increased from 1.45 GiB (runs with 15 iterations to fail) to 1.63 GiB

Total memory: 1.95GiB
Free memory: 1.63GiB

EDIT: started several graphical applications to decrease memory to 1.22GiB. Now only 7 iterations until exception.

body:
After tweaking the minimal example, I also got the error after 17 and 18 iterations
I noticed the free memory increased from 1.45 GiB (runs with 15 iterations to fail) to 1.63 GiB

    Total memory: 1.95GiB
    Free memory: 1.63GiB

EDIT: started several graphical applications to decrease memory to 1.22GiB. Now only 7 iterations until exception.
